code.codeSystemName: 卫生信息共享文档规范编码体系

patientRole.patient:
<id extension="<@privacy_tag value="${emrBasicpatient.identityNo!'NA'}" privacyId="1">${privacy}</@privacy_tag>" root="2.16.156.10011.1.3"/> <@privacy_tag value="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.patientName!'NA'}" privacyId="2">${privacy}</@privacy_tag> <administrativeGenderCode code="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.patientSex!'NA'}" codeSystem="2.16.156.10011.2.3.3.4" codeSystemName="生理性别代码表(GB/T 2261.1)" displayName="<@dict_tag value="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.patientSex!'NA'}" datasetCloumn="PATIENT_SEX">${dict.desc}</@dict_tag>"/> <#if hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.maritalStatusCode??> <maritalStatusCode code="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.maritalStatusCode!'NA'}" codeSystem="2.16.156.10011.2.3.3.5" codeSystemName="婚姻状况代码表(GB/T 2261.2)" displayName="<@dict_tag value="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.maritalStatusCode!'NA'}" datasetCloumn="MARITAL_STATUS_CODE">${dict.desc}</@dict_tag>"/> </#if> <#if hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.nation??> <ethnicGroupCode code="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.nation!'NA'}" codeSystem="2.16.156.10011.2.3.3.3" codeSystemName="民族类别代码表(GB 3304)" displayName="<@dict_tag value="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.nation!'NA'}" datasetCloumn="NATION">${dict.desc}</@dict_tag>"/> </#if>
<#if hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.ageYear??>

</#if> </#if> <#if hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.occupatientionClassCode??>
<occupationCode code="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.occupatientionClassCode!'NA'}" codeSystem="2.16.156.10011.2.3.3.13" codeSystemName="从业状况(个人身体)代码表(GB/T 2261.4)" displayName="<@dict_tag value="${hours24AdmissionDeathRecord.occupatientionClassCode!'NA'}" datasetCloumn="OCCUPATIENTION_CLASS_CODE">${dict.desc}</@dict_tag>"/>
</#if>

informant.assignedEntity:
